extension.valueString: NHLBI Implementation Science and Health Care Innovation Author

name: LABALAMAPreparationsForCOPD
title: LABA LAMA Preparations for COPD
publisher: NHLBI Implementation Science and Health Care Innovation Steward
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This valueset contains oral inhalant preparations of a long acting beta agonist in combination with a long acting muscarinic antagonist that are used for maintenance therapy in patients with COPD.),(Data Element Scope: FHIR 
MedicationStatement.medicationCodeableConcept, MedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConcept),(Inclusion Criteria: Oral inhalant combo preparations of formoterol / aclidinium, olodaterol / tiotropium, vilanterol / umeclidinium, formoterol / glycopyrrolate, and indacaterol / glycopyrrolate.  None of these preparations are indicated for use in asthma, but their formulations overlap with maintenance controller therapy recommendations as per the NHLBI NAEPP EPR3 Guidelines for the Diagnosis and Management of Asthma (2007) and associated Summary Report and Quick Reference Guide and the 2020 Focused Updates to the Asthma Management Guidelines, so their use in asthma may be encountered.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes withdrawn preparations and retired codes (although they may still be available from pharmacies until supplies are exhausted))
